title: The Brain That Wouldn't Die (1962 Horror) Directed by Joseph Green

sources.title: The Brain That Wouldn't Die (1962 Horror) Directed by Joseph Green
sources.description:
It was the strangest experiment ever conceived... and it didn't go as planned!
After a car crash decapitates his fianc√©e, an obsessed surgeon keeps her head alive in a laboratory, while seeking a new body for her, leading to gruesome consequences when she gains psychic abilities and rebels against him.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/ApU1VSX7U30

Original title: The Brain That Wouldn't Die (1962)
Subtitles are available.


Director: Joseph Green 
Writers: Joseph Green, Rex Carlton
Stars: Jason Evers, Virginia Leith, Anthony La Penna 
Genre: Classics, Cult Film, Crime, Horror, Sci-Fi, Mystery, Thriller
Budget: $300,000 

00:00 Full Movie
00:05 Dr. Desperate Plea -A distraught Dr. Cortner begs for permission to experiment on a deceased patient.
02:40 A Risky Experiment - Dr. Cortner defies medical norms, shocking the corpse back to life.
05:24 A Controversial Breakthrough - Dr. Cortner's unorthodox methods yield unexpected results, sparking ethical debate.
08:04 A Visionary Goal - Dr. Cortner dreams of revolutionizing medicine through radical transplantation.
10:16 A Dark Secret - Dr. Cortner's obsession with his research leads to a sinister secret.
11:59 A Disturbing Discovery - A mysterious phone call sends Dr. Cortner to his secluded country house.
17:24 A Horrific Accident - A tragic accident forces Dr. Cortner to make a horrifying decision.
20:05 A Monstrous Creation - Dr. Cortner's experiments birth a grotesque and terrifying creature.
29:43 A Desperate Search - Dr. Cortner seeks a suitable body for his monstrous creation.
36:34 A Twisted Alliance -  The creature and Dr. Cortner's assistant, Jan, form an unholy alliance.
41:00 The Ultimate Horror - The true extent of Dr. Cortner's madness is revealed.
56:19 A Desperate Gamble - Dr. Cortner targets a beautiful woman, Doris, for his sinister plan.
1:01:32 A Dangerous Encounter -  Dr. Cortner's obsession leads to a fateful encounter with Doris.
1:14:47 A Deadly Deception - Dr. Cortner drugs Doris, preparing her for a horrifying fate.
1:17:25 A Final Confrontation - A climactic showdown between Dr. Cortner, the creature, and Doris.
